member.name: P:HttpTunnelient.HttpTunnelClient.Credential
member.summary: Proxy basic authentication. Default is null.

member.name: P:HttpTunnelient.HttpTunnelClient.UserAgent
member.summary: The user-agent field that used for CONNECT request. Default is null.

member.name: P:HttpTunnelient.HttpTunnelClient.KeepAlive
member.summary: Get or set the Proxy-Connection field to "keep-alive" or "close". Default is true.

member.name: F:HttpTunnelient.Status.Closed
member.summary: Tunnel connection closed, can not reuse.
